title: Tavernkeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose someone to Entice.
- Enticed players will be controlled into visiting you.
- Enticed players won't attack you, and they won't receive night notifications while they are Enticed other than they slept safely.
- You can't Entice the same player twice in a row.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn the name of all players who visit you at the end of the night.
- If 2 or more players visit you, the Introduction becomes "*The misguided protagonist begins in a tavern, hoping to acquire riches.*" When the story is completed with this Introduction, you astrally roleblock all good players.

desc:
Post 3331
"*My tavern has had an unusual amount of 'adventurers' after the war started.*"
